ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱعْتَدَوْا۟ مِنكُمْ فِى ٱلسَّبْتِ فَقُلْنَا لَهُمْ كُونُوا۟ قِرَدَةً خَٰسِـِٔينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You are well aware of those of you who broke the Sabbath. We said to them, 'Be apes, despised, cast out.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You know and have known already those among you who had broken the sanctity of the Sabbath, and to whom We had said: "Become (like) apes despised,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And you know well the story of those among you who broke Sabbath. We said to them, "Be apes despised and hated by all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You certainly knew about those among you who were transgressors on the Sabbath. We commanded them, "Become detested apes,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And you certainly know of those amongst you who transgressed in the matter of Sabth (Sabbath – Saturday) – We therefore said to them, “Become apes, despised!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed you knew those amongst you who transgressed in the matter of the Sabbath (i.e. Saturday). We said to them: "Be you monkeys, despised and rejected."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly you have known those among you who exceeded the limits of the Sabbath, so We said to them: Be (as) apes, despised and hated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And well you know there were those among you that transgressed the Sabbath, and We said to them, 'Be you apes, miserably slinking!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And ye know of those of you who broke the Sabbath, how We said unto them: Be ye apes, despised and hated!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You are aware of those who transgressed in the matter of the Sabbath, whereupon We said to them, "Be as apes, despised!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly ye know of those of you who trespassed in the matter of the Sabbath, wherefore We said unto them: be ye apes despised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And certainly you know those of you who violated the Sabbath, whereupon We said to them, ‘Be you spurned apes.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And well ye knew those amongst you who transgressed in the matter of the Sabbath: We said to them: "Be ye apes, despised and rejected."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed you knew those amongst you who transgressed in the matter of the Sabbath (i.e. Saturday). We said to them: "Be you monkeys, despised and rejected."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You have surely known of those amongst you who transgressed the Sabbath. We said to them: 'Be apes, despised'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And you surely knew those of you who violated the Sabbath. We said to them, “Be despicable apes!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And you had already known about those who transgressed among you concerning the sabbath, and We said to them, "Be apes, despised."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:65] And verily (wa-la-qad: the lām is for oaths) you know that there were those among you who transgressed, violated, the Sabbath, by fishing, when We had forbidden you to do so — these were the inhabitants of Eilat — and We said to them, ‘Be apes, despised!’, rejected, and they became so: they died three days later.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And ye know) you indeed know and heard about the punishment (of those of you who broke) who have taken the covenant (the Sabbath) the day of Saturday and this at the time of David (pbuh) (how We said unto them: Be ye apes, despised and hated!) turned into humiliated and base apes.
